passives.name: Blur
passives.effects: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] reduce the remaining cooldowns of your abilities and spells with {{tip|dash|dashes}} and/or {{tip|blink|blinks}} by 12%, modified to 4% for your ultimate ability.

effects_structured.raw: Basic attacks [[on-hit]] reduce the remaining cooldowns of your abilities and spells with {{tip dash dashes}} and/or {{tip blink blinks}} by 12%, modified to 4% for your ultimate ability.
